name: Acid Reflux (GERD)
description: A digestive disorder where stomach acid frequently flows back into the food pipe, causing irritation.
symptoms: Regurgitation of food or sour liquid
causes: Weak lower esophageal sphincter allowing acid reflux.
when_to_seek_help: Seek medical advice if symptoms persist or worsen.

name: Acne
description: A skin condition that occurs when hair follicles become clogged with oil and dead skin cells.
causes: Excess oil production and bacterial infection.
when_to_seek_help: Consult a dermatologist if acne is severe or persistent.

name: Allergic Rhinitis
description: An allergic reaction causing sneezing, congestion, and itchy eyes, commonly known as hay fever.
causes: Exposure to allergens such as pollen, dust mites, or pet dander.
prevention_tips: Keep windows closed during pollen season
when_to_seek_help: See a doctor if symptoms interfere with daily life.
